ABOUT_ME.INTRO: Hey there, I am Rolf! I'm an aspiring frontend developer with a strong interest in modern web technologies. I love turning creative ideas into interactive, responsive user interfaces. My passion for coding comes from the joy of problem-solving and continuous learning. I'm inspired by great UI/UX design and real-world projects that challenge me to grow.
ABOUT_ME.LOCALISATION: I reside in Blankenburg(Harz) and am open to remote work without any issues. Additionally, I am willing to work on-site flexibly within a 50 to 100 km radius around Blankenburg(Harz).
ABOUT_ME.EFFORT: I'm always open to new ideas and technologies. I enjoy stepping out of my comfort zone to explore new tools, frameworks, and best practices. Learning is a constant journey for me, and I love improving my skills one project at a time.
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: Solving problems is one of my favorite parts of coding. I use analytical thinking to understand the root of an issue, and creativity to find efficient solutions. I believe in persistence and learning from every challenge. I also value collaboration to gain new perspectives.

SKILLS.INTRO: I work with a variety of modern frontend technologies and enjoy exploring new tools and concepts. Continuous learning is essential to me, as I strive to keep up with the fast-paced developments and trends in the web industry.
SKILLS.EXPANDING: Feel free to contact me . I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
SKILLS.SPECIAL_INT: I have a special interest in learning

PROJECTS.EXPLANATION: Explore a selection of my work here - interact with projects to see my skills in action.

EPL.ABOUT_CONTENT: Jump, run and throw game based on object-orientated approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to to fight against the crazy hen.

JOIN.ABOUT_CONTENT: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System, Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

PORTFOLIO.ABOUT_CONTENT: This portfolio was built with Angular and TypeScript and showcases selected examples of my work as an aspiring frontend developer. It not only serves as a presentation but also reflects my skills in modern web technologies.

QUOTATIONS.HEADING: What my colleagues say about me

QUO_1.TEXT: 'Rolf approaches projects holistically – his foresight has often saved us from unnecessary extra work.'
QUO_1.NAME: Philipp S.

QUO_2.TEXT: 'Whenever something gets stuck, Rolf jumps in – analytical, focused, and with solutions no one else had thought of.'
QUO_2.NAME: Tim G.

QUO_3.TEXT: 'Rolf inspires the whole team – his dedication lifts us all and clearly raises the bar.'
QUO_3.NAME: Florian L.

QUO_4.TEXT: Whether it’s new tools or complex frameworks, Rolf learns incredibly fast and implements everything with precision.'
QUO_4.NAME: Anton M.

QUO_5.TEXT: With his broad general knowledge, Rolf often brings in perspectives that elegantly connect technical and content-related questions.'
QUO_5.NAME: Chris A.

QUO_6.TEXT: Rolf is our all-rounder – he can dive into any task and consistently delivers at a high level.'
QUO_6.NAME: Ferhat S.

PP.GEN_INFO_CONTENT: I take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy informs you about what data is collected on my website and how it is used. The website serves to introduce myself and links to various projects hosted on separate subdomains.
PP.RES_PARTY_CONTENT: I am responsible for data processing on this website:
PP.PERS_HEADING: 3. Collection and Storage of Personal Data
PP.PERS_DATA_CONTENT: When visiting this website, certain information about your access is automatically stored, including:
PP.PERS_DATA_EXPL: This data is used for security and website improvement purposes and is not used to personally identify you.
PP.COOKIE_CONTENT: This website does not use tracking cookies. If individual linked subdomains or projects use cookies, separate privacy policies will be provided there.
PP.EXT_LINKS_CONTENT: My website contains links to my own projects hosted on separate subdomains. When accessing these pages, their respective privacy policies apply. I have no control over what data is collected there.
PP.PROCESSING_INFO: The processing of personal data is based on my legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR) to ensure the security and functionality of the website.
PP.RIGHTS_INTRO: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
PP.RIGHTS_EXPL: To exercise these rights, you can contact me using the details provided above.
PP.CHANGES_PP_CONTENT: I reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time to comply with legal requirements or to reflect changes on the website.
